titleStmt.title: SII 14.134: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 134. (A.R. No. 70 of 1907.) AMBĀSAMUDRAM, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE TIRUMŪLANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This incomplete epigraph dated in the 6th year of Jaṭāvarman Sundara-Chōḷa-Pāṇḍya relates to some gift, the nature of which is not specified, made by Śēndaṉ-Nambi-Naṅgai, for burning a lamp in front of the Tirumūlasthāṉattu-Mahādēva at Tiruchchālaittuṟai in Rājarāja-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Muḷḷi-nāḍu, a subdivision of Muḍikoṇḍaśōḻa-vaḷanāḍu, a division of Rājarāja-Pāṇḍināḍu. Śēndaṉ Irugaiyaṉ, a merchant of Kshatriyaśikhāmaṇipuram is stated to be her guardian (Mudugaṇ).

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koccaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉa śrī cuntaracoḻapāṇṭiyatevarkku yāṇṭu Āṟāvatu śrī Irājairājappāṇṭināṭṭu muṭikoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷināṭṭu
brahmateyam śrī rājarājaccatuṟvetimaṅkalattu tiruccālaittuṟai śrī mulastāṉa Āḻvār tevaṟku māhāṣastriRead mahā devarkku kṣatriyaº. śikāmaṇipurattu Irukkum viyāpāri centa
ṉ Irukaiyaṉ mutukaṇṇāka centaṉ nampi naṅkai vaitta viḷaThe inscription stops here abruptly.
Digital edition of SII 14.134 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
